mapper.select: /* StatisticDAO.selectMonthlyReport 월별 접속자 통계 */ SELECT SUBSTRING(OCCRRNC_DE,5,2) AS OMONTH , SUM(USER_CO) AS OCNT FROM COMTSUSERSUMMARY WHERE LEFT(OCCRRNC_DE, 4) = DATE_FORMAT(CURDATE(),'%Y') GROUP BY OMONTH

/* StatisticDAO.selectRcntBbsList 최근 등록된 게시물 10건 가져오기 */ SELECT BBS_ID, NTT_SJ, DATE_FORMAT(FRST_REGIST_PNTTM, '%Y-%m-%d') AS FRST_REGIST_PNTTM, NTCR_ID FROM COMTNBBS ORDER BY FRST_REGIST_PNTTM DESC LIMIT 10

/* StatisticDAO.selectPopulMenuList 인기 메뉴 5건 가져오기 */ SELECT T1.URL , T1.RDCNT , T2.PROGRM_STRE_PATH , T2.PROGRM_KOREAN_NM FROM COMTSWEBLOGSUMMARY T1 INNER JOIN COMTNPROGRMLIST T2 ON T1.URL = T2.URL WHERE T2.PROGRM_FILE_NM like '%View%' ORDER BY T1.RDCNT DESC LIMIT 5
